name: Mars Keeper
description:
Let's play

Mars Keeper is a Virtual Reality video game inspired by games like Iron Rebellion or Vox Machinae. It has similar mechanics, adapting the controls to our interests so that they work well and in the most intuitive, comfortable and, above all, immersive way for the user.

History

The game is set on the planet Mars, where the last refuge of humans is located in the face of a large-scale invasion that devastated their defenses on Earth. You will have to protect the refuge with all your might against the infinite waves of enemies that will attack you, only you can protect the last refuge of humanity.

Combat

Fight in an epic wave battle to survive, use the three types of special weapons available and pilot your own Mecha, conquer Mars and defeat enemies. 

¿What are you waiting for player?

Install instructions

Just download and unzip.
